    use super::*;
    use crate::payment::adapter::PaymentAdapter;

    #[tokio::test]
    async fn test_factory_creates_stripe_adapter() {
        let adapter = PaymentAdapterFactory::create_adapter(PaymentProvider::Stripe);
        let result = adapter.process_payment(1000, "USD").await;
        assert!(result.is_ok());
        let order_id = result.unwrap();
        assert!(order_id.starts_with("stripe_charge_"));
    }
